title: SIGN THE PETITION: Open Dominion for its final days!

embed.description: We launched Dominion more than four years ago as an alternative game mode designed to challenge players with fast-paced skirmishes, capture-and-hold gameplay, and different skills to master. Back then, we truly believed the mode would introduce new players to League of Legends and provide current players with an experience as captivating as Summoner's Rift.

body: Since Dominion is being retired, is it possible to open it up for its end of days??
